Package ants.tasks

Interface Summary
Task Interface for a task to be performed each turn.
 

Class Summary
AttackHillsTask Task that identifies enemy hills suitable for attacking and sends Ants to attack them.
BaseTask Base implementation of a Task, mainly so Tasks that have no need for a setup method don't need to implement it.
ClearHillTask Task that ensures that no ant blocks our hills.
ClusteringTask This task is responsible for dividing up the map into clusters.
CombatTask This task identifies vulnerable enemy ants and sends a troop of our ants to attack them.
DefendAreaTask This task identifies vulnerable or valuable areas and orders ants to patrol, defending them.
ExploreTask This task sends ants into unexplored areas of the map to discover new frontiers - to boldly go where no ant has gone before.
FollowTask This task orders our ants that don't have anything better to do to follow another ant.
GatherFoodTask Searches for food and sends our ants to gather it.
MissionTask This task is responsible for allowing those ants that are currently following a Mission to execute the next step of their mission.
ValidateOrdersTask
